name: Christmas Solitaire Tri-Peaks
description:
Whilst snow drifts over frosted trees, cosy up and settle down to Christmas Solitaire Tri-Peaks, our festive card game. Help Santa and his reindeer unveil their secret grotto using the classic tri-peaks rules. All you have to do is match the cards that are higher or lower with the shown card. If you get stuck, we have a helpful hint which will highlight any possible moves. We even have a wildcard to get you out of tricky situations! Clear all three peaks to win the game.

Based on our well-loved Magic Towers Solitaire game, this edition has festive sounds abound, gliding gameplay, clean-cut design and a relaxing atmosphere with a faint jingle of bells. You may even have a visit from Santa himself!

If you enjoy puzzling over card games like Freecell, Pyramid or Spider Solitaire, then Christmas Solitaire will certainly please.

Features:
• Wildcard
• Hints and tips
• Local and global scoreboards.
• Quick and easy to learn
• Atmospheric festive sound effects
• Crisp graphics and seamless gameplay
• Family friendly

Get into the festive spirit with Christmas Solitaire Tri-Peaks in a beautiful winter wonderland.
